item.description:
Calling all music lovers! Jon Pousette-Dart (of Pousette Dart Band fame) is playing with some very talented local musician at the Adams Opera House in Derry. I saw him perform a couple of years ago and it was a fantastic show.  Tickets can be purchased at the door. Price is $22.50 for general admission at 8:00 or VIP tickets cost $28.50 and includes a Meet and Greet (light refreshments with the musicians) at 7:00 and preferred seating.

I’ll be working the show so I can make sure you meet up with other Meetup folks.

The Pousette-Dart Band, led by Jon Pousette-Dart carved a place in the landscape of American music in the 1970’s. They were a mainstay of album radio, a favorite on the college circuit, and became one of the busiest touring groups in the US. While the original group dis-banded in the early 80’s, Jon kept performing with original drummer Eric Parker and continued writing and producing into the 90’s, when he returned to Nashville to begin recording again on his own. He turned out four more solo albums and recently released “Anti-Gravity”, a cohesive selection of his best songs to date. He has co-written with some of the finest writers in the country including, Darrell Scott, Gary Nicholson, Jaime Kyle, Kostas, John Bohlinger, Angelo, Sally Barris, Fred Knobloch, and Angela Kaset. ‘Heaven is Here’ from youtube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LnpTVVUUqC0&...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Joan when you buy your ticket at the front desk
item.name: Concert: Jon Pousette-Dart with Harvest
